message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our unique product to you. This product holds significant value to us, and we believe it could be an excellent addition to your collection. Given its importance, we are offering it to you for $1200000. We understand its worth to you might be higher, but we hope this offer presents a fair compromise. Please let us know if you would like to discuss further or proceed with the purchase.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, we've decided to counter your offer with a price of $1050000. We believe this reflects the true value of the product and hope it aligns better with your expectations. We're looking forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the market value.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your feedback and are willing to consider it. In light of our previous discussions, we propose a final offer of $1100000 for the product. We believe this price respects both the intrinsic value of the product and your perceived value of it. We look forward to your response.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $980000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the market value.

We understand your position, Bob, and we are glad to see that we are getting closer. Based on our latest discussion, we would like to offer you the product for $1075000. This price reflects the value we place on the product and also acknowledges your assessment of its worth to you. We hope this offer will be acceptable to you.
I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1050000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.
